property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure: Given an alignment, the AlignmentEditor_Seaview actor displays the alignment in the seaview window and facititates the user to edit the alignment. Note1: since Seaview is an application running as another process with GUI, the actor cannot monitor the execution of Seaview. Thus the actor cannot know when the user finishes the work and closes the Seaview window. Note2: Here we assume the user will save the output file with the same name as the input file. We will change it to let the user input the output file name in the future.

property.name: port:standardError
property.configure: The standard error stream of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: port:inputTrigger
property.configure: The trigger that will enable the execution of this actor is received through this port.

property.name: port:exitCode
property.configure: The exit code of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: port:outputFileName
property.configure: The output file name is sent out throught this port. The output file contains the edited alignment.

property.name: port:inputFileName
property.configure: The input file name is transferred into the actor through this port. The input file contains the alignment for reviewing and editing.

property.name: port:standardOutput
property.configure: The standard output stream of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: prop:monitoredErrorWords
property.configure: The monitored words are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:errorFile
property.configure: The standard error file's path and name are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:workingDirectory
property.configure: The workfing directory of the external program is defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:arguments
property.configure: The arguments of the program that will be executed are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:outputFile
property.configure: The standard output file's path and name are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:command
property.configure: The command path and name are defined in this parameter.
